name: We Hotel Aeropuerto
description: Welcome to We Hotel Aeropuerto, your Mexico City “home away from home.” We Hotel Aeropuerto aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year. Nearby landmarks such as Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez (2.1 mi) and Foro Sol (2.1 mi) make We Hotel Aeropuerto a great place to stay when visiting Mexico City. We Hotel Aeropuerto offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available. The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a fitness center. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. If you’re looking for something to do, Banos Medicinales del Penon (0.4 mi) and Shrine of Guadalupe ( 3 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of We Hotel Aeropuerto. We Hotel Aeropuerto puts the best of Mexico City at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable. We Offer Free shuttle service from and to the airporrt each 15 minutes 24 hrs

name: Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico
description: Discover the Old World elegance of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico, an exquisite turn-of-the-century property perfectly located in downtown Mexico City. You can feel the history from the moment you step inside. From the Art Nouveau decor to the gilded open elevators and immaculate stained-glass ceiling in the lobby, every inch of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico pays tribute to the past while providing the comfort you expect from a fine luxury hotel. The palatial ambience continues in the guest rooms. Enjoy a unique blend of traditional and contemporary decor as you sink into a plush bed. Many rooms also feature stunning views of the vibrant Zocalo square just outside the hotel. You can also marvel at spectacular scenery from the Terraza Restaurant, which is perched on the fifth floor. When it's time to explore, ask our knowledgeable concierge for recommendations on the best shows, events and attractions in Mexico City. A 24-hour fitness area and well-equipped business center are among the other amenities you can enjoy. We also provide the perfect starting point for exploring everything Mexico City has to offer. Delve into Mexican culture at the Palacio de BellasArtes, explore Old Corpus Christi or embrace the charm of the Casino Espanol De Mexico. Stay at the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and savor a unique blend of comfort, service and style.
amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

Pero sobre todo, tenemos una misión: rescatar nuestro querido barrio, una cerveza a la vez.

Nearby landmarks such as Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez (2.1 mi) and Foro Sol (2.1 mi) make We Hotel Aeropuerto a great place to stay when visiting Mexico City. We Hotel Aeropuerto offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available. The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a fitness center. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. If you’re looking for something to do, Banos Medicinales del Penon (0.4 mi) and Shrine of Guadalupe ( 3 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of We Hotel Aeropuerto. We Hotel Aeropuerto puts the best of Mexico City at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable. We Offer Free shuttle service from and to the airporrt each 15 minutes 24 hrs
amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

name: NH Collection Mexico City Airport T2
description: NH Collection Mexico City Airport T2 exudes a feeling of modern luxury. The hotel is reachable in minutes by elevator or shuttle from the airport and is only 30-minutes away from city center by taxi. There are 287 rooms that feature a warm, modern design with high, bright windows and neutral green tones. NH Collection Mexico City Airport T2 is there for your comfort and relaxation, including coffee and tea making facilities, a mini bar, pillow menu and free Wi-Fi. Whether you are in Mexico City for business or pleasure, you will enjoy sunbathing on the terrace, or hitting the gym. Breakfast will leave you energized for the whole day, with a wide variety of hot and cold dishes, accompanied by fresh juices and freshly brewed coffee and tea.

description: Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel is perfectly located in Mexico City's financial district, across from the Angel of Independence. name: Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico
description: Discover the Old World elegance of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico, an exquisite turn-of-the-century property perfectly located in downtown Mexico City. You can feel the history from the moment you step inside. From the Art Nouveau decor to the gilded open elevators and immaculate stained-glass ceiling in the lobby, every inch of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico pays tribute to the past while providing the comfort you expect from a fine luxury hotel. The palatial ambience continues in the guest rooms. Enjoy a unique blend of traditional and contemporary decor as you sink into a plush bed. Many rooms also feature stunning views of the vibrant Zocalo square just outside the hotel. You can also marvel at spectacular scenery from the Terraza Restaurant, which is perched on the fifth floor. When it's time to explore, ask our knowledgeable concierge for recommendations on the best shows, events and attractions in Mexico City. A 24-hour fitness area and well-equipped business center are among the other amenities you can enjoy. We also provide the perfect starting point for exploring everything Mexico City has to offer. Delve into Mexican culture at the Palacio de BellasArtes, explore Old Corpus Christi or embrace the charm of the Casino Espanol De Mexico. Stay at the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and savor a unique blend of comfort, service and style.
amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

From the Art Nouveau decor to the gilded open elevators and immaculate stained-glass ceiling in the lobby, every inch of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico pays tribute to the past while providing the comfort you expect from a fine luxury hotel. The palatial ambience continues in the guest rooms. Enjoy a unique blend of traditional and contemporary decor as you sink into a plush bed. Many rooms also feature stunning views of the vibrant Zocalo square just outside the hotel. You can also marvel at spectacular scenery from the Terraza Restaurant, which is perched on the fifth floor. When it's time to explore, ask our knowledgeable concierge for recommendations on the best shows, events and attractions in Mexico City. A 24-hour fitness area and well-equipped business center are among the other amenities you can enjoy. We also provide the perfect starting point for exploring everything Mexico City has to offer. Delve into Mexican culture at the Palacio de BellasArtes, explore Old Corpus Christi or embrace the charm of the Casino Espanol De Mexico. Stay at the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and savor a unique blend of comfort, service and style.
amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

name: We Hotel Aeropuerto
description: Welcome to We Hotel Aeropuerto, your Mexico City “home away from home.” We Hotel Aeropuerto aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year. Nearby landmarks such as Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez (2.1 mi) and Foro Sol (2.1 mi) make We Hotel Aeropuerto a great place to stay when visiting Mexico City. We Hotel Aeropuerto offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available. The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a fitness center. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. If you’re looking for something to do, Banos Medicinales del Penon (0.4 mi) and Shrine of Guadalupe ( 3 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of We Hotel Aeropuerto. We Hotel Aeropuerto puts the best of Mexico City at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable. We Offer Free shuttle service from and to the airporrt each 15 minutes 24 hrs

NH Collection Mexico City Airport T2 is there for your comfort and relaxation, including coffee and tea making facilities, a mini bar, pillow menu and free Wi-Fi. Whether you are in Mexico City for business or pleasure, you will enjoy sunbathing on the terrace, or hitting the gym. name: Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico
description: Discover the Old World elegance of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico, an exquisite turn-of-the-century property perfectly located in downtown Mexico City. You can feel the history from the moment you step inside. From the Art Nouveau decor to the gilded open elevators and immaculate stained-glass ceiling in the lobby, every inch of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico pays tribute to the past while providing the comfort you expect from a fine luxury hotel. The palatial ambience continues in the guest rooms. Enjoy a unique blend of traditional and contemporary decor as you sink into a plush bed. Many rooms also feature stunning views of the vibrant Zocalo square just outside the hotel. You can also marvel at spectacular scenery from the Terraza Restaurant, which is perched on the fifth floor. When it's time to explore, ask our knowledgeable concierge for recommendations on the best shows, events and attractions in Mexico City. A 24-hour fitness area and well-equipped business center are among the other amenities you can enjoy. We also provide the perfect starting point for exploring everything Mexico City has to offer. Delve into Mexican culture at the Palacio de BellasArtes, explore Old Corpus Christi or embrace the charm of the Casino Espanol De Mexico. Stay at the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and savor a unique blend of comfort, service and style.

name: We Hotel Aeropuerto
description: Welcome to We Hotel Aeropuerto, your Mexico City “home away from home.” We Hotel Aeropuerto aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year. Nearby landmarks such as Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez (2.1 mi) and Foro Sol (2.1 mi) make We Hotel Aeropuerto a great place to stay when visiting Mexico City. We Hotel Aeropuerto offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available. The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a fitness center. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. If you’re looking for something to do, Banos Medicinales del Penon (0.4 mi) and Shrine of Guadalupe ( 3 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of We Hotel Aeropuerto. We Hotel Aeropuerto puts the best of Mexico City at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable. We Offer Free shuttle service from and to the airporrt each 15 minutes 24 hrs

name: Marquis Reforma Hotel & Spa
description: Be inspired at the Marquis Reforma Hotel & Spa, a Leading Hotels of the World property located along Mexico City's fashionable Paseo de la Reforma avenue. This is where chic, contemporary style meets warm, intuitive service. It's the personal touches that really make us stand out. Friendly, attentive and always discreet, our staff takes the time to understand your unique needs. We're home to the only certified Leading SPA in Mexico City. Allow our therapists at our spa to help you relax with a holistic treatment or stress-melting massage. Complete your busy day dining at one of our three exquisite restaurants, where you can find the best of the Mexican , Spanish, Italian, Argentinian gastronomies.

name: Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico
description: Discover the Old World elegance of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico, an exquisite turn-of-the-century property perfectly located in downtown Mexico City. You can feel the history from the moment you step inside. From the Art Nouveau decor to the gilded open elevators and immaculate stained-glass ceiling in the lobby, every inch of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico pays tribute to the past while providing the comfort you expect from a fine luxury hotel. The palatial ambience continues in the guest rooms. Enjoy a unique blend of traditional and contemporary decor as you sink into a plush bed. Many rooms also feature stunning views of the vibrant Zocalo square just outside the hotel. You can also marvel at spectacular scenery from the Terraza Restaurant, which is perched on the fifth floor. When it's time to explore, ask our knowledgeable concierge for recommendations on the best shows, events and attractions in Mexico City. A 24-hour fitness area and well-equipped business center are among the other amenities you can enjoy. We also provide the perfect starting point for exploring everything Mexico City has to offer. Delve into Mexican culture at the Palacio de BellasArtes, explore Old Corpus Christi or embrace the charm of the Casino Espanol De Mexico. Stay at the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and savor a unique blend of comfort, service and style.
amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

name: Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico
description: Discover the Old World elegance of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico, an exquisite turn-of-the-century property perfectly located in downtown Mexico City. You can feel the history from the moment you step inside. From the Art Nouveau decor to the gilded open elevators and immaculate stained-glass ceiling in the lobby, every inch of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico pays tribute to the past while providing the comfort you expect from a fine luxury hotel. The palatial ambience continues in the guest rooms. Enjoy a unique blend of traditional and contemporary decor as you sink into a plush bed. Many rooms also feature stunning views of the vibrant Zocalo square just outside the hotel. You can also marvel at spectacular scenery from the Terraza Restaurant, which is perched on the fifth floor. When it's time to explore, ask our knowledgeable concierge for recommendations on the best shows, events and attractions in Mexico City. A 24-hour fitness area and well-equipped business center are among the other amenities you can enjoy. We also provide the perfect starting point for exploring everything Mexico City has to offer. Delve into Mexican culture at the Palacio de BellasArtes, explore Old Corpus Christi or embrace the charm of the Casino Espanol De Mexico. Stay at the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and savor a unique blend of comfort, service and style.
amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

name: Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico
description: Discover the Old World elegance of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico, an exquisite turn-of-the-century property perfectly located in downtown Mexico City. You can feel the history from the moment you step inside. From the Art Nouveau decor to the gilded open elevators and immaculate stained-glass ceiling in the lobby, every inch of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico pays tribute to the past while providing the comfort you expect from a fine luxury hotel. The palatial ambience continues in the guest rooms. Enjoy a unique blend of traditional and contemporary decor as you sink into a plush bed. Many rooms also feature stunning views of the vibrant Zocalo square just outside the hotel. You can also marvel at spectacular scenery from the Terraza Restaurant, which is perched on the fifth floor. When it's time to explore, ask our knowledgeable concierge for recommendations on the best shows, events and attractions in Mexico City. A 24-hour fitness area and well-equipped business center are among the other amenities you can enjoy. We also provide the perfect starting point for exploring everything Mexico City has to offer. Delve into Mexican culture at the Palacio de BellasArtes, explore Old Corpus Christi or embrace the charm of the Casino Espanol De Mexico. Stay at the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and savor a unique blend of comfort, service and style.
amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

We Hotel Aeropuerto offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available. name: Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico
description: Discover the Old World elegance of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico, an exquisite turn-of-the-century property perfectly located in downtown Mexico City. You can feel the history from the moment you step inside. From the Art Nouveau decor to the gilded open elevators and immaculate stained-glass ceiling in the lobby, every inch of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico pays tribute to the past while providing the comfort you expect from a fine luxury hotel. The palatial ambience continues in the guest rooms. Enjoy a unique blend of traditional and contemporary decor as you sink into a plush bed. Many rooms also feature stunning views of the vibrant Zocalo square just outside the hotel. You can also marvel at spectacular scenery from the Terraza Restaurant, which is perched on the fifth floor. When it's time to explore, ask our knowledgeable concierge for recommendations on the best shows, events and attractions in Mexico City. A 24-hour fitness area and well-equipped business center are among the other amenities you can enjoy. We also provide the perfect starting point for exploring everything Mexico City has to offer. Delve into Mexican culture at the Palacio de BellasArtes, explore Old Corpus Christi or embrace the charm of the Casino Espanol De Mexico. Stay at the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and savor a unique blend of comfort, service and style.
amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

name: Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico
description: Discover the Old World elegance of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico, an exquisite turn-of-the-century property perfectly located in downtown Mexico City. You can feel the history from the moment you step inside. From the Art Nouveau decor to the gilded open elevators and immaculate stained-glass ceiling in the lobby, every inch of the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico pays tribute to the past while providing the comfort you expect from a fine luxury hotel. The palatial ambience continues in the guest rooms. Enjoy a unique blend of traditional and contemporary decor as you sink into a plush bed. Many rooms also feature stunning views of the vibrant Zocalo square just outside the hotel. You can also marvel at spectacular scenery from the Terraza Restaurant, which is perched on the fifth floor. When it's time to explore, ask our knowledgeable concierge for recommendations on the best shows, events and attractions in Mexico City. A 24-hour fitness area and well-equipped business center are among the other amenities you can enjoy. We also provide the perfect starting point for exploring everything Mexico City has to offer. Delve into Mexican culture at the Palacio de BellasArtes, explore Old Corpus Christi or embrace the charm of the Casino Espanol De Mexico. Stay at the Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and savor a unique blend of comfort, service and style.
amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

name: Nima Local House Hotel
description: Welcome to Nima! Nima means big in the mayan world, which is why we decided to go big. We opened doors in 2016, pretty new yet pretty different, changing the way visitors live their experience in the city. Located in one of the best areas of Mexico City, La Roma, Nima is surrounded by numerous bars, restaurants, cafes, shops, and nightclubs giving the option to go out to explore and relax at the same time. Mixing several concepts such as elegance and coziness, this place will make every moment count from the minute you step in. The four chambers have a unique decoration with private bathroom, king size beds, conciergerie service is provided. The whole house counts with secure free Wi-Fi, the shared areas are the roof garden, living room, and a business center. Nima is more than a hotel, it's a real house that has great history behind its doors, built in one of the most important times in the history of Mexico, el Porfiriato. It also survived the strongest earthquake in the city in 1985. This house now opens its doors to welcome their guests. Welcome to Nima, and please, make yourself at home.

name: Casa Mali by Dominion
description: Located in Condesa,one of Mexico City's trendiest neighborhoods. Casa Malí by Dominion is facing one of the most beautiful parks in Mexico City, surrounded by multicultural terraces, cafés and gastronomic restaurants. Casa Malí by Dominion is an exquisite blend of Art deco elements and contemporary comfort. We offer 21 suites, studios & one bedrooms, living-dining room & fully equipped kitchen. The perfect place for executives that enjoy an urban living. Free WiFi, Complimentary buffet, daily housekeeping, Laundry & Dry Cleaning services, grocery shopping, 24 hr security.
